ignoreMissingParameters.description: If true will not fail if a parameter is not found in the universe. The parameter will just be ignored.

file.description: Filename of json or binary file storing solution.

parameters.description: Array of parameters for which the covariance equation has to be generated.

items.description: Parameter name, can be any of the available parameters in the universe parameters book.

values.description: Array of a-priori values for the parameters. Must have the same size as 'parameters'.

items.description: A-priori value for a parameter. Can be dimensionless or with units, but it must match the units of the parameter definition in the universe. The value is converted internally to SI units.

sigma.description: Array of a-priori sigmas for the parameters. Must have the same size as 'parameters'. If 'sigma' is given, the covariance matrix is assumed diagonal and the full 'covariance' matrix cannot be provided.

items.description: A-priori sigma for a parameter. No units can be provided here, the values must be consistent with SI units.

covariance.description: A-priori covariance matrix for the given 'parameters'. This must be a matrix of size NxN, where N is the size of the 'parameters' array. No units can be provided here, the values must be consistent with SI units.
